name: Mini Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Talc-Free Vegan Powder
about: What it is:A super soft, sheer setting and smoothing powder baked with skincare that sweeps away shine (not glow), feels like nothing, but looks like everything..Coverage:Light.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Pressed Powder.Highlighted Ingredients:- Bamboo Stem Extract: Absorbs excess oil, leaving skin looking matte and feeling soft..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This formula starts as a mousse packed with skin-supporting ingredients and is baked to achieve the perfect ultrafine layer of sheer pigment. Its unique airy texture gives your skin the most smooth, blurred, healthy look ever. Get the diffused, natural finish of a loose powder in a no-mess pressed powder..Clinical Results:Based on a consumer study of 20 females wearing Tinted Face Oil, Revealer Concealer and Cloud Set for 1 week:
ingredients: -Bamboo Stem Extract: Absorbs excess oil, leaving skin looking matte and feeling soft..-Passion-fruit Leaf Extract: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles..-Chinese Peony: Visibly minimizes pores...Mica, Silica, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Lauroyl Lysine, Glyceryl Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Potassium Sorbate, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Aqua / Water, Stearic Acid, Candelilla Cera / Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Cetearyl Olivate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Olivate, Honokiol, Paeonia Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Extract / Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract (+/-): CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77491 / Iron Oxides, CI 77492 / Iron Oxides, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a tapered brush to sweep or pat the powder onto your forehead, chin, and noseu2014or wherever you want to absorb oil or set makeup.

I plan to use it all over my face in place of Airy this winter when I want to do cool makeup looks, but it isnu2019t worth purchasing as a u201cbrightener.u201d Mmm in the summer

reviews.review_title: It did replace my favourite setting powder
reviews.review_text: I love minimal makeup look for everyday use. I usually donu2019t use any skin tint or foundation. But using this cloud set baked setting and smoothing powder makes my skin looks better. Love it

I have combination oily and dry skin, and this powder is perfect for it! doesnu2019t emphasize dry patches, while keeping oily areas like the T zone matte. only complaint is that the price seems pretty high for a setting powders

So far this powder has been great. It has a velvety texture, and no scent (which I love). It has a nice shine free finish and has slight coverage so it doesnu2019t look cakey. The case seems nice and solid and looks pretty. Definitely recommend

I love the Kosas Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Powder! It has a super soft texture that sets my makeup beautifully without making my skin look dull. It absorbs excess shine while maintaining a natural glow, leaving a smooth, flawless finish. It feels incredibly light, almost like I'm not wearing any makeup at all, but the results are amazing. The powder doesn't settle into fine lines or accentuate dry patches. It feels comfortable all day long, even with extended wear. Overall, this powder is a must-have for a natural, smooth, and polished look!

I have tried so many different skin care and makeup products over all the years, including lighter toned powders to combat oil and shine, especially on my face.  I have tried a few other products that I purchased from Sephora from this brand Kosas and have loved those as well and this cloud set smoothing and setting powder worked better than expected.  Feeling the texture of the powder was not gritty or grainy, or didnu2019t even feel too thick as some other powders I have used have felt before which I discontinued use of.   This powder not only lasted and sat on the skin on my face for hours, but took any shine from my tea zone, especially my nose away, and it felt like my skin could breathe underneath this powder.   The only thing I wish that came with this powder was a branded brush or applicator to make it easier to use when on the go.

reviews.review_title: A Must Have To Your Daily Routine!
reviews.review_text: I received this product for FREE from Influenster & Sephora for my honest review! I was surprised with this setting powder. Its texture is so smooth & the finish is amazing! Highly Recommend FIVE STARS! #FREE #SEPHORA #INFLUENSTER
This powder is so good, itu2019s so light which I love and not cakey at all 10/10 recommend

This is a lovely light powder that does a good job at keeping minimal oil at bay!  I have combination skin that gets slightly oily throughout the day and this works perfectly. I also havenu2019t had any issues with clogged pores or breakouts and I have sensitive skin too. The plastic compact is a little hard to open though.

My skin is kinda pale so itu2019s not easy to find a right shade for me but I tried u201cbreezyu201d and fell in love. Perfect for my oily skin and it doesnu2019t clog up my pores. It doesnu2019t smell which is a huge plus for me.

This Kosas Setting Powder is amazing! I chose the color Breezy, and thankfully it matches my light to medium tone perfectly. It's easy to apply and glides so smoothly onto my skin. I use a foundation brush or powder puff to apply it after my makeup as a finishing touch. It's light and airy, and hardly even noticeable on my face. It hides all my acne blemishes and redness around my nose, and makes my skin texture look more even. It gives my face that matte finish, and makes my skin look flawless. It reduces the shine on my tzone, has my skin feeling super soft, and blends well with my skin tone. It sets my foundation and concealer in place, and helps it last longer throughout the day. Very happy with this product and will continue to use it every time I do full face makeup.

reviews.review_title: Musttttt use in every makeup look!!
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s great super soft and dewy finish. It doesnu2019t leave you cakey yet has a full coverage. Love the product and ingredients with its natural smell.

reviews.review_title: My face looks flawless and smooth.
reviews.review_text: Kosas Cloud Set Baked Setting & Smoothing Powder in Pillowy Sheer Medium Tan leaves my face looking flawless. It removes shine without giving me a full matte finish. The color was a great match. Usually tan can mean many things and medium can run dark. This was perfect. I also appreciate that it doesn't sit in my fine lines and creases highlighting all my years that are beginning to show up  as most other powders tend to do. I did touch up later in the day in a couple areas but I was nitpicking and it likely wasn't needed.    If I had to find anything to fault with this product, it would be with the clasp on the container itself. It's a very tight clasp and I struggled to open it with two hands. I really love being able to open my compacts with one hand or at very least with brush in one hand assisting the other. This was frustrating and a time wasted. I know it's not like it takes forever but when you have a routine and the kid is crying,  breakfast is burning and you woke up late already, seconds matter. I definitely love this powder, hate the container.
I really like this powder! Itu2019s a pressed powder which I like more than a loose one. It sets really well and makes my makeup look really nice. I definitely recommend!
I love the compact it came in very well made. It minimizes my pores and takes the shine away. Itu2019s very soft and lightweight. Iu2019m very pleased with this baked setting & smoothing powder.

This setting powder is amazing! It gives my face a flawless look, and the coverage lasts all day. Itu2019s super lightweight and covers up imperfections beautifully. The packaging is gorgeous! ufffcIu2019m hooked! Incentivized review

This has such a silky texture. Love thr coverage and finish it leaves on my skin. Sets all my makeup for thr whole day without being cakey. No scent to this powder.

I really love the feeling this give to you, i just putting on and donst feel heavy right now. Dont have any scent and i dont think leave a heavy coverage. Leave a really good finish but i still have to see how works all day long.
Love the packaging, full coverage, excellent finish. I absolutely love this cloud set. Smooth finish is everything, I highly recommend this product and

Kossas pressed powder is my go to product when I want less make up look, but I still need to look good. It's very light and easily sets on my skin without leaving it too cakey. It has a gentle coverage but it's quite smoothing and blurring. Great for humid days as it nicely protected my skin and make up from looking too shiny. The packaging itself is ok but could be slightly easier to open. Overall great product.

I loved how lightweight the formula felt on my skin. It sets makeup effortlessly without caking or feeling too heavy, and it offers a soft, natural matte finish that keeps oil at bay for a good part of the day. I also appreciate the minimalist packagingu2014itu2019s compact and looks sleek on my vanity.  However, there are a few drawbacks. If you have dry skin, this powder might emphasize those areas. I found that it clung to some dry patches, even after moisturizing. Additionally, it doesnu2019t blur pores as much as Iu2019d hoped, so if youu2019re looking for a more smoothing effect, this may fall short. While itu2019s a nice addition for oil control, it might not be everyoneu2019s favorite depending on skin type.

Itu2019s ok I guess but the packaging is such a mess! It breaks all the time-including transportation. When I open it it breaks sometimes because itu2019s hard to open! I would say it does the job just at what cost?!

reviews.review_title: Beware of the Mini, it is too delicate!
reviews.review_text: I love the Kosas powder, I have went through 2 full sized powders. I donu2019t usually spend money on mini sized products of things I own in full size, but I bought the mini of this for travel since the packaging is so bulky, and I love it so much.  I didnu2019t even get to travel with it before it shattered into dust.  I had this in a drawer, not a makeup bag, and the very first time I tried to use it, the whole domed top of the powder came loose, and it was just a shattered powder nightmare. I canu2019t even imagine if I would have tried to put this in a makeup bag, or actually travel with it. However, the packaging needs serious work... it's so difficult to open the case without accidentally digging your nails into the powder. And like some of the other reviewers, after less than 5 uses, a bulk of the powder just broke off. I'm pretty sure this can be easily resolved by changing the packaging to something that's easier to open.
